channel.title: The QBB Project
channel.description: The QBB project provides a set of libraries to facilitate the straightforward development of simulations.

item.title: Talk about Qubus
item.description:
We will give a talk about the Qubus tensor library and other QBB projects on 19 January 2016 at Kiel University. Interested are welcome.

Where: Kiel University, Department of Physics, room LS15-R230

When: 2016-01-19, 10:15 - 11:45
